3 Components #permalink

Full screen focus mode

Design components are reusable designs that can be applied using just the CSS class names specified in the component.

3.1 Site Features #permalink

Full screen focus mode

  • IVN is a platform for unfiltered political news from independent-minded authors, bound only by a simple etiquette.
  • Our legal strategy is the first organized effort to assert the right of every voter to have an equally meaningful vote, regardless of their party affiliation.
  • IVP holds non-partisan substantive discussions on critical issues facing our communities.
  • IVP Chapters are designed to engage young leaders to promote the basic principle that our election process should serve people first.
     


<div style="background: black; height: 500px; width: 100%;">

</div>
